private void bbqRadioButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_bbqRadioButtonActionPerformed
        // changing radio buttons to select only one
        if (bbqRadioButton.isSelected()){
            wavyRadioButton.setSelected(false);
            jalepenoRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_bbqRadioButtonActionPerformed

    private void wavyRadioButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_wavyRadioButtonActionPerformed
        // changing radio buttons so only one is selected
        if (wavyRadioButton.isSelected()){
            bbqRadioButton.setSelected(false);
            jalepenoRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_wavyRadioButtonActionPerformed

    private void jalepenoRadioButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jalepenoRadioButtonActionPerformed
        // changing radio buttons so only one is selected
        if (jalepenoRadioButton.isSelected()){
            wavyRadioButton.setSelected(false);
            bbqRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jalepenoRadioButtonActionPerformed

private void purchaseJLabel1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_purchaseJLabel1ActionPerformed
        //pays for purchase if we have enough money
        double money = 0;
        money = Double.parseDouble(insertMoneyTextField1.getText());
        if (bbqRadioButton.isSelected()){
            money = money - 1.50;   
        }
            else if(wavyRadioButton.isSelected()){
           money = money - 1.50; 
            }
            else if(jalepenoRadioButton.isSelected()){
            money = money - 1.50;
            }
        
        if (money <0){
            changeTextField1.setText("Enter more money");
        } else {
            changeTextField1.setText(Double.toString(money));
            }
            
        }//GEN-LAST:event_purchaseJLabel1ActionPerformed


    private void clearJLabel1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_clearJLabel1ActionPerformed
       // clears all selections and text fields
        bbqRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        wavyRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        jalepenoRadioButton.setSelected(false);
        moneyTextField1.setText("  ");
        changeTextField1.setText("  ");

    }//GEN-LAST:event_clearJLabel1ActionPerformed

    private void cancelJLabel1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_cancelJLabel1ActionPerformed
        //cancel 
	System.exit(0);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_cancelJLabel1ActionPerformed

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }//GEN-LAST:event_insertMoneyTextField1ActionPerformed

    }//GEN-LAST:event_changeTextField1ActionPerformed
